title: Setup React Native project structure
body:
## Description

Configure React Native/Expo project with proper organization and navigation.

## Tasks

- Setup React Navigation with stack navigator
- Create screens and components directories
- Configure TypeScript strict mode
- Add global styles and theme
- Setup SafeAreaView for iOS notch handling

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Navigation working between screens
- [ ] Directory structure properly organized
- [ ] TypeScript compiles without errors
- [ ] App runs on iOS and Android
- [ ] SafeAreaView handles device notches correctly

## Type

Feature

## Platform

Mobile

## Priority

High

---

_Created by claude-plan-to-issues workflow_
_Milestone: Notes App MVP_
